##### FILE: node_pod_network_policies_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to v6-jobs/NetworkPolicy/v6-alg-runner-policy:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: v6-alg-runner-policy
  namespace: v6-jobs
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 4567
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: v6-node-server-proxy
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    - port: 53
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: kube-system
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: v6-node-server-proxy
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      role: v6_alg_runner
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notify-svc:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: notify-svc
  name: notify-svc
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notify-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notify-svc
      name: notify-svc
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connectionString
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: RabbitMQ__Host
          value: rabbit-clusterip
        - name: RabbitMQ__Username
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: rabbit-secret
        - name: RabbitMQ__Password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: rabbit-secret
        - name: AzureAd__Instance
          value: https://login.microsoftonline.com/
        - name: AzureAd__TenantId
          value: TENANT_ID
        - name: AzureAd__ClientId
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientId
              name: azure-secret
        - name: AzureAd__ClientSecret
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientSecret
              name: azure-secret
        - name: AzureAd__Scopes
          value: SCOPES
        - name: DownstreamApi__BaseUrl
          value: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__0
          value: SCOPES
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__1
          value: openid
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__2
          value: profile
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__3
          value: offline_access
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__4
          value: email
        image: realshinchoku/ddhc-notify-svc
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: notify-svc

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: non-ap-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: appprotect.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend1-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend1
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend2-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - appprotect.example.com
    secretName: appprotect-secret

##### FILE: none_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to none/Deployment/fortio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fortio
  namespace: none
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fortio
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/interceptionMode: NONE
        status.sidecar.istio.io/port: "0"
      labels:
        app: fortio
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - -static-dir
        - /usr/share/fortio/
        - --stdclient
        - -http-port
        - :28080
        - -grpc-port
        - :28079
        env:
        - name: HTTP_PROXY
          value: 127.0.0.1:15002
        image: costinm/fortio:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: echosrv
        ports:
        - containerPort: 18080
        - containerPort: 18079
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1G
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1G

---

        - -t

        - -c
        - "32"

          value: 127.0.0.1:15002

            memory: 1G

kind: PersistentVolume

  name: pv0003
  namespace: default

  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 5Gi
  mountOptions:
  - hard
  - nfsvers=4.1
  nfs:
    path: /tmp
    server: 172.17.0.2
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Recycle
  storageClassName: slow
  volumeMode: Filesystem
status:
  phase: Bound

##### FILE: non-matching11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/matching:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: matching
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/nginx-slim:0.8
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: my-storage-class

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/norequests:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: norequests
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/norequests:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: norequests
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/norequests:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: norequests
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: not-deploy-patched02.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeploy02:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mydeploy02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "false"
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vault:1.5.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: vault-agent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /vault/secrets
          name: vault-secret
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
      initContainers:
      - image: vault:1.5.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: vault-agent-init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /vault/secrets
          name: vault-secret
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: vault-secret

---

##### FILE: not-deploy-patched033.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeploy03:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mydeploy03
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vault:1.5.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: vault-agent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /vault/secrets
          name: vault-secret
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
      initContainers:
      - image: vault:1.5.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: vault-agent-init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /vault/secrets
          name: vault-secret
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: vault-secret

---

##### FILE: notes-db-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to app-notes-dev/Deployment/notes-db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notes-db-deployment
  namespace: app-notes-dev
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notes-db-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notes-db-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - containerPort: 5432
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: notes-ui-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: notes-ui-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: notes-ui-secret
        image: postgres:10.1
        name: notes-db-app
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/docker/pgdata
          name: notes-db-volume
      volumes:
      - name: notes-db-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: notes-db-pvc

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: notice-service_1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notice-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: notice-service
    app.kubernetes.io/name: notice-service
  name: notice-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notice-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notice-service
        app.kubernetes.io/name: notice-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: notice-service-secrets
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: notice-service-secrets
        - name: SPRING_CONFIG_LOCATION
          value: /config/application.yml
        image: kovengers/notice-service:103
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: notice-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      nodeSelector:
        kakaoi.io/kke-nodepool: backend-node
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: notice-service-config
        name: config

##### FILE: notification_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/notification:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notification
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification
        version: v1
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - notification
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: prod
        - name: JHIPSTER_SECURITY_AUTHENTICATION_JWT_BASE64_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secret
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_DATABASE
          value: notification
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_URI
          value: mongodb://notification-mongodb-0.notification-mongodb.jhipster:27017
        - name: SPRING_SLEUTH_PROPAGATION_KEYS
          value: x-request-id,x-ot-span-context
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: ' -Xmx256m -Xms256m'
        - name: SERVER_SHUTDOWN
          value: graceful
        image: kamathadityaa/notification-istio
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /management/health/liveness
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
        name: notification-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8083
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 6
          httpGet:
            path: /management/health/readiness
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsGroup: 3000
          runAsUser: 1000
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          while true
          do
            rt=$(nc -z -w 1 notification-mongodb 27017)
            if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
              echo "DB is UP"
              break
            fi
            echo "DB is not yet reachable;sleep for 10s before retry"
            sleep 10
          done
        image: busybox:latest
        name: init-ds

---

##### FILE: notification_mongodb_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/ConfigMap/notification-mongodb-init:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  on-start.sh: |
    script_name=${0##*/}

    log() {
        local msg="$1"
        local timestamp
        timestamp=$(date --iso-8601=ns)
        echo "[$timestamp] [$script_name] $msg" >> /work-dir/log.txt
    }

    shutdown_mongo() {
        if [[ $# -eq 1 ]]; then
            args="timeoutSecs: $1"
        else
            args='force: true'
        fi
        log "Shutting down MongoDB ($args)..."
        mongo admin "${admin_creds[@]}" "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "db.shutdownServer({$args})"
    }

    my_hostname=$(hostname)
    log "Bootstrapping MongoDB replica set member: $my_hostname"

    log "Reading standard input..."
    while read -ra line; do
        if [[ "${line}" == *"${my_hostname}"* ]]; then
            service_name="$line"
            continue
        fi
        peers=("${peers[@]}" "$line")
    done

    # Generate the ca cert
    ca_crt=/data/configdb/tls.crt
    if [ -f "$ca_crt"  ]; then
        log "Generating certificate"
        ca_key=/data/configdb/tls.key
        pem=/work-dir/mongo.pem
        ssl_args=(--ssl --sslCAFile "$ca_crt" --sslPEMKeyFile "$pem")

    # Move into /work-dir
    pushd /work-dir

    cat >openssl.cnf <<EOL
    [req]
    req_extensions = v3_req
    distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
    [req_distinguished_name]
    [ v3_req ]
    basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
    keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
    subjectAltName = @alt_names
    [alt_names]
    DNS.1 = $(echo -n "$my_hostname" | sed s/-[0-9]*$//)
    DNS.2 = $my_hostname
    DNS.3 = $service_name
    DNS.4 = localhost
    DNS.5 = 127.0.0.1
    EOL

        # Generate the certs
        openssl genrsa -out mongo.key 2048
        openssl req -new -key mongo.key -out mongo.csr -subj "/CN=$my_hostname" -config openssl.cnf
        openssl x509 -req -in mongo.csr \
            -CA "$ca_crt" -CAkey "$ca_key" -CAcreateserial \
            -out mongo.crt -days 3650 -extensions v3_req -extfile openssl.cnf

        rm mongo.csr
        cat mongo.crt mongo.key > $pem
        rm mongo.key mongo.crt
    fi


    log "Peers: ${peers[*]}"

    log "Starting a MongoDB instance..."
    mongod --config /data/configdb/mongod.conf --dbpath="$DATA_PATH" --replSet="$REPLICA_SET" --port=$PORT "${auth_args[@]}" --bind_ip=0.0.0.0 >> /work-dir/log.txt 2>&1 &

    log "Waiting for MongoDB to be ready..."
    until mongo "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "db.adminCommand('ping')"; do
        log "Retrying..."
        sleep 2
    done

    log "Initialized."

    # try to find a master and add yourself to its replica set.
    for peer in "${peers[@]}"; do
        if mongo admin --host "$peer" "${admin_creds[@]}" "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "rs.isMaster()" | grep '"ismaster" : true'; then
            log "Found master: $peer"
            log "Adding myself ($service_name) to replica set..."
            if mongo admin --host "$peer" "${admin_creds[@]}" "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "rs.add('$service_name')" | grep 'Quorum check failed'; then
                log 'Quorum check failed, unable to join replicaset. Exiting prematurely.'
                shutdown_mongo
                exit 1
            fi

            sleep 3

            log 'Waiting for replica to reach SECONDARY state...'
            until printf '.' && [[ $(mongo admin "${admin_creds[@]}" "${ssl_args[@]}" --quiet --eval "rs.status().myState") == '2' ]]; do
                sleep 1
            done

            log ' Replica reached SECONDARY state.'

            shutdown_mongo "60"
            log "Good bye."
            exit 0
        fi
    done

    # else initiate a replica set with yourself.
    if mongo "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "rs.status()" | grep "no replset config has been received"; then
        log "Initiating a new replica set with myself ($service_name)..."
        mongo "${ssl_args[@]}" --eval "rs.initiate({'_id': '$REPLICA_SET', 'members': [{'_id': 0, 'host': '$service_name'}]})"

        sleep 3

        log 'Waiting for replica to reach PRIMARY state...'
        until printf '.' && [[ $(mongo "${ssl_args[@]}" --quiet --eval "rs.status().myState") == '1' ]]; do
            sleep 1
        done

        log ' Replica reached PRIMARY state.'

        log "Done."
    fi

    shutdown_mongo
    log "Good bye."
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: notification-mongodb-init
  namespace: production

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: notification_mongodb_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/StatefulSet/notification-mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: notification-mongodb
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-mongodb
  serviceName: notification-mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "false"
      labels:
        app: notification-mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/data/configdb/mongod.conf
        - --dbpath=$(DATA_PATH)
        - --replSet=$(REPLICA_SET)
        - --port=$(PORT)
        - --bind_ip=0.0.0.0
        command:
        - mongod
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: REPLICA_SET
          value: rs0
        - name: DATA_PATH
          value: /data/db
        - name: PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: mongo:4.4.12
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: peer
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: datadir
        - mountPath: /data/configdb
          name: configdir
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: workdir
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - |
          set -e
          set -x
          cp /configdb-readonly/mongod.conf /data/configdb/mongod.conf
        command:
        - sh
        image: busybox
        name: config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: workdir
        - mountPath: /configdb-readonly
          name: config
        - mountPath: /data/configdb
          name: configdir
      - args:
        - --work-dir=/work-dir
        image: k8s.gcr.io/mongodb-install:0.6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: install
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: workdir
      - args:
        - -on-start=/init/on-start.sh
        - -service=notification-mongodb
        command:
        - /work-dir/peer-finder
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: REPLICA_SET
          value: rs0
        - name: DATA_PATH
          value: /data/db
        - name: PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: mongo:4.4.12
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: boot
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: workdir
        - mountPath: /init
          name: init
        - mountPath: /data/configdb
          name: configdir
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: datadir
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: notification-mongodb-config
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workdir
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: notification-mongodb-init
        name: init
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: configdir
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: datadir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/ms-rrts-at-notification:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-rrts-at-notification
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-rrts-at-notification
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-rrts-at-notification
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENABLE_APM
          value: "1"
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        - name: CLIENT_URL
          value: http://localhost:3000
        - name: RABBITMQ_ENDPOINT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-endpoint
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: SENDER_EMAIL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: sender-email
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: SENDER_EMAIL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: sender-email-password
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_SEARCH_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elasticsearch-url
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_APM_SERVER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic-apm-server-url
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_APM_SECRET_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic-apm-secret-token
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        image: gordonsdev/p01-notification-service:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ms-rrts-at-notification
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
          name: notif-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi

kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: notificationapi
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 3
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: notificationapi

##### FILE: notification-api-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    owner: lehel
  name: notification-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URL
          value: mongodb://mongouser:mongouser@mongo-service:27017/
        - name: KAFKA_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka-uri
              name: kafka-notification-secret
        - name: KAFKA_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka-username
              name: kafka-notification-secret
        - name: KAFKA_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka-password
              name: kafka-notification-secret
        image: registry.digitalocean.com/lehel/notification-api:20240606
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: lehel-registry-secret

---

##### FILE: notification-controller1_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    control-plane: controller
  name: notification-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: fluxcd/notification-controller:v1.2.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9292
          name: http-webhook
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: notification-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: notification-controller2_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    control-plane: controller
  name: notification-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/notification-controller:v1.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9292
          name: http-webhook
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: notification-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    control-plane: controller
  name: webhook-receiver
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: http-webhook
  selector:
    app: notification-controller
  type: ClusterIP

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: notification-controller3_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    control-plane: controller
  name: notification-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/notification-controller:v1.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9292
          name: http-webhook
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: notification-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/notification-controller failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

        - --watch-all-namespaces

              resource: limits.memory

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    control-plane: controller
  name: notification-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/notification-controller:v1.5.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9292
          name: http-webhook
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: notification-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notification-controller
    control-plane: controller
  name: notification-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/notification-controller:v1.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9292
          name: http-webhook
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: notification-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: notification
  name: notification
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 8
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: notification-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: notification-secret
        image: nasi101/notification
        name: notification

---

  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: notification-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: notification-secret
        image: siriusblack001/notification
        name: notification
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 256Mi

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/notification-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: notification-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 1
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 60
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 1
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 0
  maxReplicas: 2
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: notification

---

        path: /notification/send
        pathType: Prefix

            name: notification

              number: 9000

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: http://$host/signin
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: http://auth.auth.svc.cluster.local:9000/auth
  name: notification
  namespace: default

  rules:
  - host: arch.homework

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: micro-demo-notification
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: micro-demo-notification
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: micro-demo-notification
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NATS_URL
          value: http://nats-srv:4222
        - name: NATS_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: NATS_CLUSTER_ID
          value: micro-demo
        - name: PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: DB_URL
          value: mongodb://micro-demo-mongo-service/
        - name: NODEMAILER_EMAIL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NODEMAILER_EMAIL
              name: micro-demo-secret
        - name: NODEMAILER_EMAIL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NODEMAILER_EMAIL_PASSWORD
              name: micro-demo-secret
        image: irfan76k/micro-demo-notification
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: micro-demo-notification
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

  - delete

  - patch
  - update
  - watch

##### FILE: notifications.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notification-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: notification-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - runserver
        - 0.0.0.0:8006
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: wikiculture-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/notifications_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: notification-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8006
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /notifications/staticfiles
          name: notifications-static-volume
      - command:
        - python
        - consumer.py
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/notifications_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: consumer
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - collectstatic
        - --noinput
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/notifications_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: collectstatic
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /notifications/staticfiles
          name: notifications-static-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: notifications-static-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: notification
  name: notification
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 8
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: notification-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: notification-secret
        image: rishimaniac/notification
        name: notification

---

##### FILE: notification-service-db-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-service-db-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notification-service-db-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-service-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification-service-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: notifications
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: db-secrets
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: db-secrets
        image: postgres:16-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-volume
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: notification-service-pvc

##### FILE: notificationservice-db-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notificationservice-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
    kompose.service.type: loadbalancer
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
    org.springframework.boot.ignore: "true"
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: notificationservice-db
  name: notificationservice-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: notificationservice-db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
        kompose.service.type: loadbalancer
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
        org.springframework.boot.ignore: "true"
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: notificationservice-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - max_connections=200
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: notificationdatabase
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mypassword
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: myuser
        image: postgres:16
        name: notificationservice-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: notificationservice-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notificationservice:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
    kompose.hpa.cpu: "70"
    kompose.hpa.memory: "80"
    kompose.hpa.replicas.max: "5"
    kompose.hpa.replicas.min: "2"
    kompose.image-pull-policy: Always
    kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/liveness
    kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_port: "8083"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/readiness
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_port: "8083"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.retries: "3"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.start_period: 8s
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.timeout: 5s
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
    kompose.volume.type: emptyDir
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: notificationservice
  name: notificationservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: notificationservice
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
        kompose.hpa.cpu: "70"
        kompose.hpa.memory: "80"
        kompose.hpa.replicas.max: "5"
        kompose.hpa.replicas.min: "2"
        kompose.image-pull-policy: Always
        kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/liveness
        kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_port: "8083"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/readiness
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_port: "8083"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.retries: "3"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.start_period: 8s
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.timeout: 5s
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
        kompose.volume.type: emptyDir
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: notificationservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: EUREKA_URI
          value: http://servicediscovery:8761/eureka
        - name: JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS
          value: -XX:ActiveProcessorCount=4 -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=100M
        - name: POSTGRES_URI
          value: jdbc:postgresql://notificationservice-db:5434/
        - name: RABBITMQ_HOST
          value: rabbitmq
        - name: ZIPKIN_URI
          value: http://zipkin:9411/
        image: ghcr.io/tobias-pe/distributed-systems-energy-efficiency/notificationservice:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8083
          initialDelaySeconds: 8
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: notificationservice
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8083
          initialDelaySeconds: 8
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: "1048576e3"
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: "1048576e3"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace/notificationservice
          name: notificationservice-empty0
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: notificationservice-empty0

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notification-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: C:\Users\nadun\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WinGet\Links\kompose.exe convert
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: notification-service
  name: notification-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: notification-service
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: C:\Users\nadun\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WinGet\Links\kompose.exe
          convert
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/lms-microservice-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: notification-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_URI
          value: mongodb+srv://admin:admin@lms.mqm8lgp.mongodb.net/notification-service?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=LMS
        - name: PORT
          value: "1114"
        image: notification-service
        name: notifications
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1114
          hostPort: 1114
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: notification-service-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: notification-service-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: notification-service-claim0
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/notificationservice:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: notificationservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 5
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: notificationservice

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notify-svc
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notify-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notify-svc
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RabbitMq__Host
          value: rabbit-clusterip
        - name: RabbitMq__Username
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitUn
              name: notify-secret
        - name: RabbitMq__Password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitPw
              name: notify-secret
        image: amg31/notify-svc
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: notify-svc

##### FILE: notirier-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notifier-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: notifier
  name: notifier-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notifier
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 8
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notifier
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-url
              name: rabbitmq-configmap
        - name: RABBITMQ_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-port
              name: rabbitmq-configmap
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-username
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-password
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: notifier-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: notifier-secret
        image: pritamsarkar123/vtm3_notifier_kube_2024:latest
        name: notifier

---

    request.autoscaling.kubecost.com/enabled: "true"

    app: busybox
    env: test
  name: deploy01
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: busybox

      labels:
        app: busybox

      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "9999"
        image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 10Mi

##### FILE: not-patched-deploy02.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment02:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: deployment02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - busybox
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
        resources: {}

---

  name: deployment02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - busybox
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 1

        name: busybox

##### FILE: not-patched-deploy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deploy01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    request.autoscaling.kubecost.com/enabled: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
    env: test
  name: deploy01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "9999"
        image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 10Mi

---

##### FILE: not-pod-patched04.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to remove-hostpathvols-ns/Pod/pod04:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: pod04
  namespace: remove-hostpathvols-ns
spec:
  automountServiceAccountToken: false
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /foo
      name: config-vol
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox03
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /foo
      name: empty
  volumes:
  - emptyDir:
      medium: memory
      sizeLimit: 20Mi
    name: empty
  - hostPath:
      path: /data/junk
    name: foo
  - configMap:
      items:
      - key: foo
        path: bar
      name: foo
    name: config-vol

---

kind: Pod

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

##### FILE: notsleep_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/notsleep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notsleep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notsleep
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notsleep
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - productpage
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sleep
        - 3650d
        image: curlimages/curl
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: notsleep
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/sleep/tls
          name: secret-volume
      serviceAccountName: notsleep
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: notsleep-secret

---

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/not-taskrun-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: not-taskrun-ns
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/not-taskrun-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: not-taskrun-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/not-taskrun-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

  creationTimestamp: null

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:

    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null

##### FILE: novo-deployment4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to gabriel/Deployment/gabriel-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gabriel-deployment
  name: gabriel-deployment
  namespace: gabriel
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gabriel-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gabriel-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: testing

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: novpn
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: novpn
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - --
        image: nicolaka/netshoot
        name: dnsutils

  - command:

##### FILE: npd_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.13
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-pod-probes -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:

##### FILE: npd1_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.9:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.8.9
  name: npd-v0.8.9
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      version: v0.8.9
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.8.9
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.9
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.9 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.9 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: npd10_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.16
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.16
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime
