Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.5:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.8.5
  name: npd-v0.8.5
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      version: v0.8.5
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.8.5
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/docker-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.5
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

##### FILE: npd15_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.16
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.16
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-pod-probes -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: npd17_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.19
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

##### FILE: npd18_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.19
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.19
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.19
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.13
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

##### FILE: npd3_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.9:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.8.9
  name: npd-v0.8.9
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      version: v0.8.9
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.8.9
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.9
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

##### FILE: npd4_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.7.1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.7.1
  name: npd-v0.7.1
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      version: v0.7.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.7.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/docker-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/node-problem-detector:v0.7.1
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-problem-detector
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.8.13
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/node-problem-detector/node-problem-detector:v0.8.13
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

##### FILE: npd8_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/npd-v0.8.0:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.8.0
  name: npd-v0.8.0
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      version: v0.8.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - exec /node-problem-detector --logtostderr --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/docker-monitor.json,/config/systemd-monitor.json
          --config.custom-plugin-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor-counter.json,/config/systemd-monitor-counter.json
          --config.system-stats-monitor=/config/system-stats-monitor.json >>/var/log/node-problem-detector.log
          2>&1
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/node-problem-detector:v0.8.0
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: node-problem-detector
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: localtime

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/allow-db-from-result-worker:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-db-from-result-worker
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: result
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: worker
    ports:
    - port: 5432
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

##### FILE: np-demo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/test-network-policy:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: test-network-policy
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 5978
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 10.0.0.0/24
  ingress:
  - from:
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 172.17.0.0/16
        except:
        - 172.17.1.0/24
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          project: myproject
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          role: frontend
    ports:
    - port: 6379
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      role: db
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---

    {
        "plugin": "journald",
        "pluginConfig": {
            "source": "dockerd"
        },
        "logPath": "/var/log/journal",
        "lookback": "5m",
        "bufferSize": 10,
        "source": "docker-monitor",
        "conditions": [],
        "rules": [
            {
                "type": "temporary",
                "reason": "CorruptDockerImage",
                "pattern": "Error trying v2 registry: failed to register layer: rename /var/lib/docker/image/(.+) /var/lib/docker/image/(.+): directory not empty.*"
            }
        ]
    }
  kernel-monitor.json: "{\n    \"plugin\": \"kmsg\",\n    \"logPath\": \"/dev/kmsg\",\n
    \   \"lookback\": \"5m\",\n    \"bufferSize\": 10,\n    \"source\": \"kernel-monitor\",\n
    \   \"conditions\": [\n        {\n            \"type\": \"KernelDeadlock\",\n
    \           \"reason\": \"KernelHasNoDeadlock\",\n            \"message\": \"kernel
    has no deadlock\"\n        },\n        {\n            \"type\": \"ReadonlyFilesystem\",\n
    \           \"reason\": \"FilesystemIsNotReadOnly\",\n            \"message\":
    \"Filesystem is not read-only\"\n        }\n    ],\n    \"rules\": [\n        {\n
    \           \"type\": \"temporary\",\n            \"reason\": \"OOMKilling\",\n
    \           \"pattern\": \"Kill process \\\\d+ (.+) score \\\\d+ or sacrifice
    child\\\\nKilled process \\\\d+ (.+) total-vm:\\\\d+kB, anon-rss:\\\\d+kB, file-rss:\\\\d+kB.*\"\n
    \       },\n        {\n            \"type\": \"temporary\",\n            \"reason\":
    \"TaskHung\",\n            \"pattern\": \"task \\\\S+:\\\\w+ blocked for more
    than \\\\w+ seconds\\\\.\"\n        },\n        {\n            \"type\": \"temporary\",\n
    \           \"reason\": \"UnregisterNetDevice\",\n            \"pattern\": \"unregister_netdevice:
    waiting for \\\\w+ to become free. Usage count = \\\\d+\"\n        },\n        {\n
    \           \"type\": \"temporary\",\n            \"reason\": \"KernelOops\",\n
    \           \"pattern\": \"BUG: unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference
    at .*\"\n        },\n        {\n            \"type\": \"temporary\",\n            \"reason\":
    \"KernelOops\",\n            \"pattern\": \"divide error: 0000 \\\\[#\\\\d+\\\\]
    SMP\"\n        },\n        {\n\t\t\t\"type\": \"temporary\",\n\t\t\t\"reason\":
    \"MemoryReadError\",\n\t\t\t\"pattern\": \"CE memory read error .*\"\n        },\n
    \       {\n            \"type\": \"permanent\",\n            \"condition\": \"KernelDeadlock\",\n
    \           \"reason\": \"DockerHung\",\n            \"pattern\": \"task docker:\\\\w+
    blocked for more than \\\\w+ seconds\\\\.\"\n        },\n        {\n            \"type\":
    \"permanent\",\n            \"condition\": \"ReadonlyFilesystem\",\n            \"reason\":
    \"FilesystemIsReadOnly\",\n            \"pattern\": \"Remounting filesystem read-only\"\n
    \       }\n    ]\n}\n"
kind: ConfigMap

##### FILE: npd-resources_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-problem-detector
  name: node-problem-detector
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-problem-detector
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-problem-detector
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - command:
        - /node-problem-detector
        - --logtostderr
        - --config.system-log-monitor=/config/kernel-monitor.json,/config/docker-monitor.json
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: kubesphere/node-problem-detector:v0.8.10
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 80Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 80Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /dev/kmsg
          name: kmsg
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/kmsg
        name: kmsg
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: kernel-monitor.json
            path: kernel-monitor.json
          - key: docker-monitor.json
            path: docker-monitor.json
          name: node-problem-detector-config
        name: config

---

##### FILE: np-redis.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/allow-redis-from-vote-worker:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-redis-from-vote-worker
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: vote
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: worker
    ports:
    - port: 6379
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

##### FILE: nrf-configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nrf-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nrfcfg.yaml: |
    info:
      version: 1.0.1
      description: NRF initial local configuration

    configuration:
      MongoDBName: free5gc
      MongoDBUrl: mongodb://mongodb:27017
      sbi:
        scheme: http
        registerIPv4: nrf-nnrf # IP used to serve NFs or register to another NRF
        bindingIPv4: 0.0.0.0  # IP used to bind the service
        port: 8000
        tls: # the local path of TLS key
          pem: config/TLS/nrf.pem # NRF TLS Certificate
          key: config/TLS/nrf.key # NRF TLS Private key
      DefaultPlmnId:
        mcc: 001
        mnc: 01
      serviceNameList:
        - nnrf-nfm
        - nnrf-disc

    logger:
      NRF:
        debugLevel: info
        ReportCaller: false
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    nf: nrf
  name: nrf-configmap
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-nrf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    nf: nrf
  name: free5gc-nrf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      nf: nrf
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        nf: nrf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config/nrfcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./nrf
        env:
        - name: DB_URI
          value: mongodb://mongodb/free5gc
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.5
        name: nrf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: nrf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the MongoDB; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: mongodb:27017
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-mongo
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nrf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nrf-configmap

---

##### FILE: nrue-deployment.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/oai-nr-ue:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: oai-nr-ue
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: oai-nr-ue
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: oai-nr-ue
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DU_IP
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: du-ip
              name: oai-ip-config
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: USE_ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS
          value: --sa --rfsim --log_config.global_log_options level,nocolor,time -r
            106 --numerology 1 -C 3619200000 --uicc0.imsi 208990100001100 --rfsimulator.serveraddr
            $(DU_IP) --rfsimulator.options chanmod --telnetsrv --telnetsrv.shrmod
            ciUE --telnetsrv.listenaddr $(POD_IP) --telnetsrv.listenport 8091
        image: oaisoftwarealliance/oai-nr-ue:develop
        name: oai-nr-ue
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/oai-nr-ue/etc/nr-ue.conf
          name: nrue-config
          subPath: nr-ue.conf
        - mountPath: /opt/oai-nr-ue/etc/rfsim_channel_ci.conf
          name: rfsim-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nrue-config
        name: nrue-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: rfsim-config

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx-ingress

  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: deny-privileged-bad-ns01
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/deny-privileged-bad-ns01:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: deny-privileged-bad-ns01

    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: deny-privileged-good-ns03
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: record-create-ns

  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/team-b:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: team-b
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/team-b:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: team-b
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/team-b:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: team-b
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container
